description.raw:
This PR implements the connection between gazebo_ros_pkgs repository and jenkins to implement testing in the pull request sent in the github repository. Details:

 * DSL will create a `ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-pr_any-${ubuntu_distro}-amd64` able to run the different ROS distributions. It also uses the standard gazebo package from the different ROS distributions.
 * DSL will also create a `ros_gazebo7_pkgs-ci-pr_any-${ubuntu_distro}-amd64` that will run testing using the gazebo7 package. Other jobs for different gazebo packages can be easily added to this CI in the gazebo_ros_pkgs.dsl.
 * Both jobs are triggered automatically from github on every pull request or under a comment `run test please`

I've modified the jobs for testing to watch for my repo and use this branch. Testing PR:

 * https://github.com/j-rivero/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/6

title: Integrate gazebo_ros_pkgs github with jenkins
